post.text: The special interests love Hillary Clinton because they have TOTAL control. Remember -- #FollowTheMoney! As president, I promise you, we will once again have a government of, by and for the PEOPLE! #TrumpIsWithYou

comment.author: Christian
comment.text: Mr Trump let the personal attacks roll off, go after Hillary on the big issues, hit her hard with Benghazi and the 4 deaths and where was Hillary when the 3:00 am call came. Hill was MIA. Hit Hillary with every thing you got throw all her evil talking points and questions back to her, hold her accountable.

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: There was no way for him to win that debate. She had Lester in her back pocket. There's a blog going around how she was signalling Lester Everytime she wNted to break in, or have him ask Nother dirty question by scratching her nose. Everytime she did, within 1 min, Lester either let her have the floor or tried to call out Trump. I waNt a real debate!!!! She knows she can't win if she plays fair.

replies.author: Rochelle
replies.text: Donald Trump has "numerous ties" to Russian interests both here in the United States and in Russia. "The level of business amounts to hundreds of millions of dollars
